Highlights.name: Career development opportunities
Highlights.description: Edology gives you access to a wide range of career development opportunities. We’re here to help you enrol on innovative distance learning degree programmes, professional qualifications, and short executive education courses from business schools and universities across the UK.

enhanced_description: Edology is a global Ed-tech company, launched in 2007 and headquartered in London, specializing in online education and professional development. Its programs are designed to foster career enhancement and provide strong CV credentials through a high-quality learning experience, aiming to equip individuals with relevant skills for continuous career growth and to meet the dynamic needs of organizations. The extensive curriculum includes distance learning degree programs, professional qualifications, and short executive education courses across fields such as Data Science, AI & Machine Learning, Data Analytics, International Business, Renewable Energy Management, Oil & Gas Management, Project Management, and Logistics & Supply Chain Management. Edology's pedagogical approach emphasizes hands-on industry projects, interactive live classes, and global peer-to-peer learning. The platform also features newly launched courses, including a PGP in Data Science and AI&ML, developed in collaboration with IBM and UCI.
